lead_paragraph: It has been a long, hard slog to the European Championship semi-finals for Portugal defender Jose Fonte.    When his country reached the last four in 2012, the center half had just helped Southampton win promotion to the English Premier League and the idea of playing international football was but a distant dream.

headline.print_headline: Long, Hard Slog to Euro Semis for Portugal's Fonte
headline.main: Long, Hard Slog to Euro Semis for Portugal's Fonte
